com.ctrlaltelite.pos.gui

Class ManageInventoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ctrlaltelite.pos.gui.ManageInventoryController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class ManageInventoryController
extends Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller class for managing inventory items held in the database. Allows for adding and editing inventory items, and produces Restock Reports and Product Usage Charts for analytics on inventory usage.
